entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
